content: @all, I just created this stream to help coordinate various efforts on Tropical Pacific projects. @Yassir Eddebbar is leading a just-funded NSF project on TIVs and OMZs. I sure we'd all benefit from sharing tools/results/solutions. @Yassir Eddebbar, feel free to reach out with questions, etc.

Link to the TPOSE 2010-2018 solution (incl. daily T/S/U/V/W) at 1/3ยบ is now available here:
http://www.ecco.ucsd.edu/tpose.html

Documentation in Verdy et al. 2017 for earlier version:
https://journals.ametsoc.org/doi/full/10.1175/JTECH-D-16-0223.1

Hi Yassir, I would love to talk more about what you are up to.

FYI, Anna-Lena Deppenmeier and I just talked with Bruce, Matt and Ariane earlier this week about doing some diagnostics related to watermass transformation on the TPOSE solution. Anna is working with Ariane to get some data to take an initial look. I am sure we find some common interest here.
Hi Yassir, it would be great to talk! I just received the first set of TPOSE heat budget data to look at. Maybe we can schedule a zoom for sometime this week?
Hey Frank and Anna-Lena, That would be great! Happy to chat later this week (Friday pref), can jump on zoom or other platform!
